summary: Violette, a 40-year old workaholic with a career in the fashion industry falls for a provincial computer geek, Jean-Rene, while on a spa retreat with her best friend.
cast: Dany Boon|Julie Delpy|Vincent Lacoste|Karin Viard|Antoine Lounguine|Christophe Vandevelde|Elise Larnicol|Christophe Canard|Nicolas Wanczycki|Rudy Milstein|Didier Duverger|Xavier Alcan|Fabienne Galula|Juliette Lamet|René-Alban Fleury|Alexandra Oppo|Jessica Cressy|Hea Deville|Katell Le Bourhis|China Moses|Pierre Thoretton|Dominique Charmet|Hélène Delpy|Nicolas Ronchi|Alan Corno|Pierre-Yves Gayraud|Zoé Marchal|Karl Lagerfeld|Frédéric Beigbeder|Ramzy Bedia|Georges Corraface|Bertrand Burgalat|Michael Darmon|Maxim Anselin|Baptiste Giabiconi|Albert Delpy|Kate Sasia|Thor Schenker|Chayma Surhan
keywords: oedipal complex|mother son relationship|breastfeeding a baby|breast feeding|breasts pulled out
title: Lolo, el hijo de mi novia
